I have tested it, and no exception happened with preview and webViewer.

Sorry ,it's my fault for using the words"run the attached file"
The right way is to use Birt Runtime ReportEngine to run the attached file.And error will occour.

This bug has two problem:
First: java.lang.AssertionError
This error is caused by Engine team. We have fixed it today.

Second: java.io.IOException
This problem need to be fixed by DTE team.
